headlines.description: Everton and Arsenal played out a 0-0 draw in the Premier League, with respective new managers Carlo Ancelotti and Mikel Arteta watching on.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton, Arsenal bore draw in front of new bosses

headlines.description: A last-gasp goal from Jay Rodriguez helped Burnley snatch a 1-0 away victory over Bournemouth in a scrappy Premier League affair on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley snatch late win at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Danny Ings struck twice to help Southampton beat Aston Villa 3-1 on Saturday as the visitors climbed out of the Premier League relegation zone.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton beat Villa to escape relegation zone

events.name: Sheffield United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Oliver McBurnie scored the only goal of the game as Sheffield United extended their Premier League unbeaten away record with a win over Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sheffield beat Brighton to close in on top four

headlines.description: Miguel Almiron's long wait for his first goal in English football ended when his late strike sealed a 1-0 victory for Newcastle United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Almiron scores 1st Newcastle goal to beat Palace

headlines.description: Wolves got back to winning ways as they punished relegation-threatened Norwich with a second-half comeback to win 2-1 in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves come from behind to win at Norwich

headlines.description: Man City beat Leicester 3-1 to cut the gap to second place to one point, but the result means Liverpool remain 10 points clear with a game in hand.
headlines.shortLinkText: City beat Leicester, Liverpool stay 10 clear at top
